title: John Henry Newman: Apostle to the Doubtful
description: Eminent Victorian academic and thinker, Anglican clergyman and celebrated convert, caring pastor and writer, Catholic priest, and Cardinal - these are some of the signposts along John Henry Newmans celebrated journey. This biography reveals a compassionate man who was much more than a writer and polemicist. As a pastor, priest, and friend, he offered lasting counsel to many and lived out the demands of the gospel. Leonie Caldecott 80 pages, paperback booklet Catholic Truth Society 9781860821219
author: Meriol Trevor
